metadata.gstNote: All costs EXCLUDE GST unless otherwise stated
sources: Rider Levett Bucknall Oceania Report Q4 2024
BMT Tax Depreciation Construction Cost Guide
assumptions: Sydney metropolitan area as base location
No heritage or significant environmental constraints unless stated
metadata.disclaimer: Rates are indicative only. Project-specific estimates should be prepared by qualified Quantity Surveyors.

locationFactors.description: Multipliers to apply to Sydney base rates
locationFactors.notes: Remote locations may attract significant premiums (1.15-1.50x) due to logistics and labour availability

escalation.applicationMethod: Apply escalation from cost plan date to construction midpoint

authority_costs.name: Authority & Statutory Costs
authority_costs.description: Government fees, levies, and statutory charges

da_fees.name: DA Application Fees
da_fees.notes: Based on construction cost brackets per EP&A Regulation

design_excellence_fees.name: Design Excellence Panel Fees
design_excellence_fees.notes: Required for projects in Design Excellence precincts or over height/FSR thresholds

cc_fees.name: Construction Certificate Fees
cc_fees.notes: Based on construction cost and project complexity

pca_appointment.name: PCA Appointment & Administration
pca_appointment.notes: Separate from CC/OC fees - ongoing inspection administration

section_7_11.name: Section 7.11 Contributions
section_7_11.notes: Local infrastructure - varies by council and development type

section_7_12.name: Section 7.12 Levy
section_7_12.notes: Alternative to 7.11 - typically 1% of construction cost over $200k

special_infrastructure.name: Special Infrastructure Contributions (SIC)
special_infrastructure.notes: State infrastructure - applies in designated growth areas

affordable_housing_contribution.name: Affordable Housing Contribution
affordable_housing_contribution.notes: Applies in designated affordable housing contribution areas (e.g., City of Sydney)

long_service_levy.name: Long Service Levy
long_service_levy.notes: Rate reduced to 0.25% from January 2023. Applies to works ≥$250,000 (incl GST). Paid to Building & Construction Industry Long Service Payments Corporation.

water_service_charges.name: Sydney Water Section 73 Application
water_service_charges.notes: Application fee only - connection charges separate

water_developer_charges.name: Sydney Water Developer Charges
water_developer_charges.notes: ET = Equivalent Tenement. Varies by zone and infrastructure capacity

water_building_plan_approval.name: Sydney Water Building Plan Approval
water_building_plan_approval.notes: Required for buildings near Sydney Water assets

electrical_headworks.name: Electrical Supply/Headworks Charges
electrical_headworks.notes: Varies significantly based on load requirements and network capacity

telecommunications.name: Telecommunications Infrastructure (NBN)
telecommunications.notes: Free for standard MDU connections; charges for complex installations

strata_registration.name: Strata Plan Registration
strata_registration.notes: Includes survey, plan preparation, and LRS fees

hoarding_permit.name: Hoarding/Scaffolding Permit
hoarding_permit.notes: Ongoing weekly/monthly fees apply. CBD rates significantly higher.

road_occupancy_permit.name: Road Occupancy Permit
road_occupancy_permit.notes: Required for crane lifts, concrete pours affecting roads. TfNSW/Council fees.

infrastructure_bond.name: Public Infrastructure Bond/Deposit
infrastructure_bond.notes: Refundable upon satisfactory completion of works. Based on construction cost.

public_notification.name: Public Notification/Advertising Fees
public_notification.notes: Newspaper advertising for DAs requiring notification

planning_panel_fees.name: Planning Panel/Court Fees
planning_panel_fees.notes: If determination goes to Sydney Planning Panel or Land & Environment Court

consultant_costs.name: Professional Fees
consultant_costs.notes: Percentages typically decrease for larger projects. Ranges shown are for medium-scale projects ($20-100M construction).

stageDistribution.description: Typical fee distribution across 5 master stages for full-service consultants
notes: Percentages are of total consultant fee
Can be adjusted per discipline based on scope
Initiation includes feasibility and initial studies
Schematic Design includes concept design and DA preparation
Design Development includes detailed design and construction documentation
Delivery includes contract administration through to completion

architect.name: Architect
architect.notes: Full service including CA. Part services reduce by 20-40%.

facade.name: Facade
facade.notes: Required for complex facades, typically high-rise

project_manager.name: Project Manager
project_manager.notes: May also be time-based. Higher % for complex projects.

development_manager.name: Development Manager
development_manager.notes: Broader scope than PM - includes commercial/financial oversight

building_surveyor.name: Building Surveyor/Certifier
building_surveyor.notes: Includes CC, OC and critical stage inspections

esd.name: ESD
esd.notes: Higher end for Green Star, NABERS, WELL certifications

geotechnical.name: Geotech
geotechnical.notes: Investigation and reporting. Complex sites significantly higher.

surveyor.name: Registered Surveyor
surveyor.notes: Detail survey, setout, strata plan registration

environmental.name: Ecology
environmental.notes: Phase 1/2 ESA, RAP, validation. Remediation significantly higher.

wind_consultant.name: Wind
wind_consultant.notes: Desktop study lower end; wind tunnel testing upper end

bim_coordinator.name: BIM Coordinator
bim_coordinator.notes: Federated model, clash detection, digital delivery

construction_costs.name: Construction Costs
construction_costs.notes: Rates shown are $/sqm GFA for Sydney metro, 2025 base date. Apply location factors and escalation as appropriate.

preliminaries.name: Preliminaries & General Requirements
preliminaries.notes: Higher percentages for CBD sites, complex logistics, or shorter programs

margin.name: Builder's Margin
margin.notes: Includes builder's overheads and profit. Varies by market conditions and risk.

substructure.name: Substructure
substructure.notes: Groundwater, rock, contamination significantly impact costs

vertical_transport.name: Vertical Transport (Lifts)
vertical_transport.notes: Add $15-25k per additional floor. High-rise premium 20-40%.

benchmarkRates.description: All-in construction rates $/sqm GFA, Sydney metro, Q1 2025
benchmarkRates.notes: Excludes land, professional fees, authority costs, contingency, and escalation

contingency.name: Contingency Allowances
contingency.notes: Design contingency covers scope development. Construction contingency covers unforeseen site conditions.

escalation.name: Escalation Allowance
escalation.application: Apply from cost plan date to construction midpoint

labour_market.name: Labour Market Risk
labour_market.notes: For tight labour markets or specialist trades

supply_chain.name: Supply Chain Risk
supply_chain.notes: For long lead items or import dependencies

ground_conditions.name: Latent Ground Conditions
ground_conditions.notes: Higher for sites with limited investigation

heritage_discovery.name: Heritage / Archaeological Discovery
heritage_discovery.notes: For sites with potential heritage constraints

construction_all_risk.name: Construction All Risk (CAR)
construction_all_risk.notes: Usually arranged by builder and included in contract

professional_indemnity.name: Professional Indemnity (consultants)
professional_indemnity.notes: Consultants required to hold PI insurance

principal_arranged.name: Principal Arranged Insurance (PAI)
principal_arranged.notes: If principal arranges insurance instead of builder

home_warranty.name: Home Warranty Insurance
home_warranty.notes: Required for residential work over $20,000. Builder arranges.

gst.name: GST
gst.notes: All costs in this template EXCLUDE GST. GST applies to most development costs except land and financial supplies.

display_suite.name: Display Suite / Sales Centre
display_suite.notes: Highly variable based on project size and marketing strategy

stamp_duty.name: Stamp Duty (Transfer Duty)
stamp_duty.notes: NSW scale applies. Premium duty for foreign purchasers.

developer_overhead.name: Developer Overhead
developer_overhead.notes: Internal development team costs, office, admin

developer_margin.name: Developer Margin / Profit
developer_margin.notes: Target profit margin. Higher for riskier projects.

well.name: WELL Certification
well.notes: IWBI fees. Higher than Green Star.
